ActorTalk: Customers, please take a number and wait in line. We appreciate your cooperation.
Excuse me, are all these people here waiting for a table?
Yep. The restaurant launched some new dishes today, and the owner paid for an ad. Turned out way more effective than expected!
Could you check how many people are in line now?
Just a moment... There are forty-three parties ahead of you. The wait is around two hours. Would you like to take a number?
Kuroro Coffee sounds good. We could enjoy some drinks and pastries there.
The wait is too long. Commandant, how about we go somewhere else? Kuroro Coffee is right next door.
